Class CLIArgumentParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • swiftsolutions.cli.CLIArgumentParser

    ArgumentParser

    public class CLIArgumentParser
extends java.lang.Object
implements ArgumentParser
    Class that parses CLI arguments and stores options

           throws ArgumentFormatException
        Method that will passed the arguments parsed in by the user from the CLI

        parse in interface ArgumentParser
        Parameters:
        args - the arguments that were passed in by the user from the CLI
        Throws:
        ArgumentFormatException - if the arguments were malformed.

      • parseInt

                     java.lang.String errMsg)
              throws ArgumentFormatException
        Function used for attempting parse integer from string.
        Parameters:
        num - string of number to be parsed
        errMsg - error message to show if parse fails
        Returns:
        number that parsed
        Throws:
        ArgumentFormatException - if the integer that was parsed was malformed.

      • getOutputFile

        public java.lang.String getOutputFile()
        Specified by:
        getOutputFile in interface ArgumentParser
        Returns:
        the string name of the preferred output file the default is [INPUT]-output.dot

      • getProcessors

        public int getProcessors()
        Specified by:
        getProcessors in interface ArgumentParser
        Returns:
        the CLIOption that holds the number of processors to schedule.

      • getCoresOption

        public CoresOption getCoresOption()
        Specified by:
        getCoresOption in interface ArgumentParser
        Returns:
        the CLIOption whether the algorithm will run in parallel mode or sequential mode, if there are 0 cores the algorithm will run in sequential mode (the default option), if there is more than 1 core specified, the algorithm will run in parallel mode with the amount of cores specified.

      • getVisualizeOption

        public VisualizeOption getVisualizeOption()
        Specified by:
        getVisualizeOption in interface ArgumentParser
        Returns:
        the CLIOption that contains whether the user wants to visualize the algorithm as it runs.

      • getOutputOption

        public OutputOption getOutputOption()
        Specified by:
        getOutputOption in interface ArgumentParser
        Returns:
        the CLIOption that contains whether the client wants to customize the output location.

      • getHelpOption

        public HelpOption getHelpOption()
        Specified by:
        getHelpOption in interface ArgumentParser
        Returns:
        the CLIOption that contains whether the user would like to display the help message (will not run the algorithm).

      • getVerboseOption

        public VerboseOption getVerboseOption()
        Specified by:
        getVerboseOption in interface ArgumentParser
        Returns:
        the CLIOption that contains whether the user would like to see DEBUG messages during the run.
